name: llm-orchestrated-traffic-analysis-system
description: LLM Orchestrated Multi Model Traffic Analysis System - BTech Major Project

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && python download_models.py
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../backend && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:windows: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q .next 2>nul & rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & cd ../backend & for /d /r . %%d in (__pycache__) do @if exist "%%d" rmdir /s /q "%%d" 2>nul
scripts.logs: concurrently --kill-others --raw "cd backend && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000" "cd frontend && npx next dev -p 3001"
scripts.test: echo "Running tests..." && cd backend && python manage.py test --verbosity=0 && echo "All tests passed"

author: BTech Student
